CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(FieloEE__Reward__r.FieloEE__VoucherCreationMode__c, 'Controlled By Item'), FieloEE__Code__c, IF ( FieloEE__CodeRange__c < 10 , FieloEE__Code__c + '0' + TEXT( FieloEE__CodeRange__c ), FieloEE__Code__c + RIGHT( TEXT( FieloEE__CodeRange__c ), 2 ) ) )
CustomField.label: Unique Code
